p: Cytotoxicity of TT on astrocytes after 24 h of treatment is shown in Fig. 4a. Compared with the control (0.01 % DMSO), the three concentrations of TT (0.5 μg/mL, 1.0 μg/mL and 10.0 μg/mL) showed no cytotoxicity (p < 0.05). This implied that the extract did not have deleterious effects on the viability of astrocytes up to10 μg/mL.
